hero.title: Frontend Engineer | E-commerce | Web systems for automation
hero.description: Turning ideas into digital solutions: Explore my portfolio of software development and take a look at the services I provide. Join me down below!

services.name: E-commerces
services.description: I create your virtual store to boost your sales no matter what your business is. E-commerce with admin panel.

services.name: Code your dream project
services.description: Do you have an idea for your next big website? Let's make it a reality. From automations to make your life easier to management platforms and professional websites.

services.name: Consulting
services.description: Are you interested in feedback for your current project? I can give you tips and tricks to level it up.

portifolio.title: Portifolio
portifolio.description: Since the beginning of my journey as a freelance designer and developer, I've done remote work for agencies consulted for startups and collaborated with talanted people to create digital products for both business and consumer use. I offer from a wide range of services, including brand design, programming and teaching.
